title: Drawing, "Design for Textile with Two Doves"
medium: Brush and red, blue, yellow watercolor, gray wash, white gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract design with two stylized doves on either side of  a tree of life; decorative bands along upper and lower edges of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile with Two Doves".
Brush and red, blue, yellow watercolor, gray wash, white gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-86.
